title: Trip to Kuala Lumpur 2024! First week
description:
It's been a long time coming but it's finally here - words and pictures!

At the beginning of this year, me and my wife were able to meet up in Malaysia. It was a time well spent.

I've left a TLDR at the end of this post for a list of places and activities we explored!

There is surprisingly good Yemeni/Syrian cuisine here! We had Mandi at a restaurant called Hadramawt.

![Mandi](https://i.imgur.com/eYLPAwr.jpeg)

When it comes to breakfast, cafe's are quite accessible and the quantity is decent. For two people we paid approx. 70 RM.

![Breakfast at Bricks & Bread](https://i.imgur.com/HlFc51i.jpg)

| | |
|-|-|
|![brekky1](https://i.imgur.com/3dfixs7.jpg)|![brekky2](https://i.imgur.com/pivvkEt.jpg)|
|![brekky3](https://i.imgur.com/vzOrx64.jpg)|![brekky4](https://i.imgur.com/obz6iAb.jpg)|
>  

But for the most part we were able to make breakfast at home.

Once we had some time we found a good rental place to get a car for a few days while we explored the city initially.

![car](https://i.imgur.com/cvODjRJ.jpeg)

It helped alot being able to drive around whenever and wherever we wanted. That week we visited the cinema and watched the new Mission Impossible, visited Batu Caves, and went to Morib beach, just south of Port Klang (we got these hotdogs here and wow they were good).

| | |
|-|-|
|![trip1](https://i.imgur.com/Hs1dgSQ.jpeg)|![trip2](https://i.imgur.com/aq1q8Z0.jpeg)|
|![trip3](https://i.imgur.com/69iBGtF.jpeg)|![trip4](https://i.imgur.com/3uC5LNf.jpeg)|
>  

![hotdog](https://i.imgur.com/oZ2iPEb.jpeg)

Although it didn't come without trouble! On the last day of renting the car I got a parking ticket outside our own apartment LOL!

| | |
|-|-|
|![trip1](https://i.imgur.com/iuIu68X.jpeg)|![trip2](https://i.imgur.com/knBKGjZ.jpeg)|
|
>  

The next day after returning the car I was running around trying to find a way to pay the small fee, which if I didn't...would turn into a much bigger fee.

---

**TLDR;**

*List of the places we visited during our stay*

- Genting Highlands / SkyWorlds Theme Park
- Sunway Lagoon Theme Park
- Batu Caves
- Berjaya Times Square
- Explore Bukit Bintang
- Aquaria KLCC
- ATV Adventure Park
- TGV Cinemas
- Pavilion Mall
- Central Market
- [Hauntu (The LINC, The Curve)](https://ihauntu.com)

*Cafe's*
- Rabbit Hole
- Hidden spot @ 9 Jalan Ceylon, Bukit
- Bricks & Bread
- 103° Coffee
author: Faizan
tags: KL Malaysia 2024 Travel Journal Food Vacation
